item.title: Dokken - Alone Again
item.description:
I’d like to see you
in the morning light
I like to feel you
when it comes to night
Now I’m here
and I’m all alone
Still I know how it
feels I’m alone again
Tired so hard
to make you see
But I couldn’t
find the words
Now the tears
they fall like rain
I’m alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
without you

I said stay but
you turned away
Tried to say
that it was me
Now I’m here and
I’ve lost my way
Now I know
how it feels
I’m alone
again
Tried so hard to
make you see
But I couldn’t
find the words
Now the tears they
fall like rain
I’m alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
without you

I tried so hard to
make you see
But I couldn’t
find the words
Now the tears they
fall like rain
I’m alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
alone again
Alone again
without you
